resources.string:
"Hello, player. I am IRIS

The point of this game is to force me to take the last coin out of the number you picked.


Game Configuration"
"Coins: Specify the number of coins we will play with.
" "Difficulty: Choose how hard I will play against you.
" "Order: Decide whether you or I will make the first move.


Main Game"
"If you've chosen to make the first move, you will be prompted to take on or two coins using the buttons provided. After you take your coins, I will take either one or two and display it to you. The game continues until someone takes the last coin. The user who takes the last coin loses.

Can you beat me?

"
